actions.text: Amendment SA 4757 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4757 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S8713-8714; text: CR S8713) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $3,000,000 for Advanced Switching and Cooling Concepts for Electromagnetic Gun Applications.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4757 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4757 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum.

purpose: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $3,000,000 for Advanced Switching and Cooling Concepts for Electromagnetic Gun Applications.
